description:
Warm, low profile, and custom-fittable, these backcountry boots let you explore on trail and off. Free-hinge cuffs with powerstraps increase stability, power and control. External cuff gaiters keep snow on the outside where it belongs. The thermo-mouldable fit lets you fine-tune them just for your feet.

  • 3-D injected upper cuffs, PVC lower cuffs
  • Polyester linings are quick-drying
  • Thinsulate™ insulation delivers warmth in a low-profile package
  • Speed lace locks allow quick and secure fit
  • Cordura lace covers keep snow and crud out
  • External 3D heel reinforcements
  • NNN BC sole
name: Rossignol BC X6 FW Touring Boots - Women's
